name: International Conference on Medicinal Chemistry, Computer Aided Drug Design and Delivery
content: The objective of the global summit is to overview and promote research carried out in the field of Medicinal Chemistry, Computer Aided Drug Design and Delivery in academic and industry content and it will be done under the theme of “Exploring Chemical Bonds for The Betterment of Mankind Through Medicinal Chemistry Innovations.” Young scholars and researchers will present their latest findings and ideas through our oral and e-poster sessions. Recognized researchers, scientists, academicians, pharmacists, clinicians, chemists, drug developers and industry delegates will give plenary lectures, keynote sessions and panel discussions on all frontier topics related to Medicinal Chemistry, Computer Aided Drug Design and Delivery and allied domains. MCADD 2022 encourages academia and industry professionals to socialize, work together and collaborate to improve the world's quality of life.
